title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE60003 Fundamentals of unsteady flow, formulation of the problem, boundary conditions; Kutta condition, Calculation of pressure, Incompressible unsteady two-dimensional lifting surface theory; Finite wing in unsteady incompressible flow, method of solutions.
